alert.note: Alert for Ocean; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 3:07PM EST until March 04 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Monmouth, Ocean and Southeastern Burlington. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The winds tonight will also be associated with heavy rain and the chance of embedded thunderstorms. This could result in localized wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
